data.text: @PMGPSC @drhilary_joyce Makes one grateful for warmth and shelter and good health. I hope she recovers soon. Thank you for your service.
@PMGPSC @ToshiAkima And she is not entitled to extra funding from the federal government that was given to other northern rivers areas
@PMGPSC Oh it’s such a familiar story. Everyone just waiting now to see what’s next

@gambley_melinda Her villa has been gutted by a group of friends.  And not much can be done now until it dries out.  
I really don’t know what she is going to do.  She is staying with a friend of ours up there for now who was not directly affected by the floods  - so at least has a place to stay.
@PMGPSC OMG!. I am so so sorry.
